scripts.deploy:staging: rm -rf /home/dennis/services/staging.dnsc.io/html && npm run build -- -b https://staging.dnsc.io -d html --minify -D && mv ./html /home/dennis/services/staging.dnsc.io/
scripts.deploy:prod: rm -rf /home/dennis/services/dnsc.io/html && npm run build -- -b https://dnsc.io --minify -d html && mv ./html /home/dennis/services/dnsc.io/
